location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '21'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View across Linga [Lingeh] from an elevated position. In the left middle-ground, clothing hangs from a washing line. Wind towers (badghirs) are visible in the background.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘21’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
